Version.description: Here are the previous versions, YAML-CSS isn't retro-compatible

backgroundColor.description: The background color, use hex format #RRGGBB

backgroundImage.description: Image as background of an element

backgroundImageScale.description: Scale the image of background in both (WIDTH & HEIGHT)

backgroundImageScaleHeight.description: Scale the image of background in HEIGHT

backgroundImageScaleWidth.description: Scale the image of background in WIDTH

width.description: The size in X axis of the element

height.description: The size of the Y axis of the element

localX.description: Local X position relative to global X position of the parent of the element

localY.description: Local Y position relative to global Y position of the parent of the element

childrenPlacement.description: The placement of the children nodes relative to they parent

selfPlacement.description: The placement of the children nodes relative to they parent

border.description: The width of the border line and the color, example: 2px #RRGGBB

border-top.description: The width of the top border line and the color, example: 2px #RRGGBB

border-bottom.description: The width of the bottom border line and the color, example: 2px #RRGGBB

border-left.description: The width of the left border line and the color, example: 2px #RRGGBB

border-right.description: The width of the right border line and the color, example: 2px #RRGGBB

textColor.description: The width of the border line and the color, example: 2px #RRGGBB

textShadow.description: If you want shadow in your text...

direction.description: The direction of a bar/scrollBar element

panelLengthX.description: The length on X axis of a panel

panelLengthY.description: The length on Y axis of a panel

tileSize.description: The size of the tile of your backgroundImage
